comment.author: 70966013@N02
comment._content: It's still there. You can type that address (94 4th Street, Deseronto, Ontario)  into Google Maps, and the "street view" will show it to you. It's a beige-coloured house. If you rotate the image, you can get this exact angle. It would be interesting to post them side-by-side. I presume that it's still the oldest house in Deseronto.
